By mepersoner on Tuesday, May 22, 2001 - 07:13 pm:

Final Part

February 29th, 1064
The monster had been training hard for a month and after One-Eye and Nova had healed they joined into two groups themselves. Nova with Destroyer, Happy, and Entity, and One-Eye with Shelley, Rocky and Big Guy. Elyk and Atries were in the weight room, Elyk strained to lift 250 pounds for his tenth time, finally got it and then set it back down. Atries added another 200 pounds and began benching it, first he took it down to his chest then slowly lifted it up, then he did it again and continued. The gym was hit with a large explosion taking out one of the walls. The trainers got up and went outside to where the monsters were training. Standing in the distance about 300 yards away was Death and a large army of about 300 monsters.
"Monsters come to me!!" Atries yelled and the monsters gathered in front of him. The trainers stood behind him. He looked over at Yeoj, "Go get the taffy and the nuts oil, we can't have our monsters fight when they're tired." Yeoj ran into the house. "This is what you all have been preparing for, this battle will be tough, we are far outnumbered and we....." He was cut off by a carriage pulled by two Baku came driving up.
Out of the carriage stepped Sutal. Out from behind him came a centaur in white armor from head to toe. "We are here to help." Sutal spoke in his normal emotionless voice. "I think you will find my monster of sufficient power to aid you, he trained with Hardcore for the last half of Hardcore's life and is pretty strong for his age. I call him Crusader."
Elyk ran into the gym and came out with his vision goggles, "Strength level is 3500. He will be very useful, he has also learned all his techniques."
A durahan made of stone, probably sub-type golem, from Death's side walked toward their side of the soon to be battlefield. "Big Guy go find out what he wants." Atries yelled, Big Guy grunted and him and Jim walked toward the durahan. Within a couple of minutes Big Guy and the durahan were standing within in ten feet of each other. The durahan yelled out to them, "Death offers you the chance to surrender, the humans death will be painless and the monsters will join our army."
"No chance in hell." Jim spoke solidly and the monster almost seemed intimidating.
"Then I am to kill you and your monster." The durahan raised his sword up into a fighting position. "I am Death's 3rd strongest monster, one of his generals, Death and his rank three will kill you." The durahan ran forward at Big Guy.
Big Guy grabbed hold of the durahan and picked him up with one hand and slammed him into the ground. The Durahan slashed at Big Guy and hit him across the chest. Big Guy stumbled back in pain, a large slice was down his chest. "I am Warrior, and I will be your death." The durahan then jumped into the air and pointed his sword straight down toward Big Guy. Big Guy closed his eyes and lifted his hands into the air, a tornado swept Warrior into the air and spun him around, he was hit by lightning and large balls of rock hard ice, then dropped to the ground. Warrior got up and slashed at Big Guy and hit him across the chest then continued spinning and hitting in a flurry of blades. Big Guy stumbled back and roared, then ran forward spinning his arms as fast as he could and began hitting Warrior over and over, knocking the sword from Warrior's hands. Warrior kicked Big Guy in the stomach then did a roundhouse sending Big Guy flying. Warrior turned around to grab his sword and found there, Jim, who bashed Warrior's head in with the sword. Warrior swung his fist at Jim and knocked hit to the ground. Big Guy grabbed Warrior from behind and began squeezing as hard as he could. The air around them froze and a large icicle, larger than a house, and ending in a needle like point, formed above them. It fell crashing and shattering as it crushed Warrior, killing him. Big Guy and Jim walked back toward the other monsters and their trainers.
"Are you okay?" Elyk came running up.
"Big Guy is hurt bad, we have to get him to bed to rest. I'm afraid he won't be able to participate in this battle. That was Death's third strongest warrior so I'm glad we could at least help out some." Jim was under Big Guy's arm and struggling to hold him up. Elyk and Jim helped Big Guy into the monster's house, laid him down in a bed made specially for larger monsters. They wrapped his wounds in bandages and went outside with the rest of the trainers and monsters.
"It seems there two other really strong monsters out there, as strong and stronger than some of us. They are Death's Elite. Besides them don't forget about Death, do not go one on one with him, you will die. If you find him try to either runaway or find another monster to help you fight him. Try to take out as many monsters as possible while wasting as little energy as possible. Try to do it from afar so there is less chance of you getting hit by an attack. Well, hope you're all ready to fight because here we go!" Elyk pointed at the army of monsters running their way.
They turned and began marching toward the army of monsters. They had the advantage that they were stronger than any of the monsters they would be fighting, but they were severely outnumbered. Destroyer began shooting ice beams and freezing monsters solid from far away. The monsters would freeze, fall over, and shatter. Inferno flew ahead of the other monsters and put his wings into the air, a large wall of fire came from behind him and splashed down on the battle field melting many monsters down to nothing. Happy stretched his arms out and hit monsters from afar knocking them down and out. One Eye shot telepathic waves and knocked monsters into the air, them shaking from the power, and collapsing on the ground when they landed, mentally gone. Entity shot little blasts from his arm and incinerated little monsters from afar. The monster army had finally reached the group and began overwhelming them.
Rocky, separated into pieces and began spinning violently, the monsters were caught up and spun around being hit by large boulders and being crushed like they were nothing. He went back together and curled into a little ball and began rolling, mowing down any monster in his way. He hit a monster and sent him flying back. He uncurled and looked up, standing in front of him was Death. Death laughed, raised his hands into the air and energy gathered in them, he put his arms in front of them and shot two energy blasts from his hands incinerating Rocky into nothing.
Nova jumped over an attack and hit the monster from behind, then turned and kicked another monster in the head. He head butted a monster in front of him and then punched to both sides knocking out two more monsters. He then gave a hard straight in front of him and blinded a suezo. He jumped toward a celius (a centaur that was sub-type tiger, had the body of a centaur but was blue and white everywhere like a tiger and had a head like a tiger) and gave a hard kick. The celius jumped out of the way. Suddenly no monsters were attacking Nova.
"I am Blaze. Death's strongest warrior. Prepare to be destroyed." With that Blaze jumped into the air and a large red rock on fire formed in his hand, with both hands he pushed it down in front of him and then plummeted toward Nova. Nova jumped out of the way, the ground imploded and all that was left was a large black hole. Blaze charged toward Nova and shot a fire ball while he was running toward Nova. Nova caught it in his little mitten like hands and pushed against the fireball and then pulled one arm back and punched it, sending it flying through the air. Blaze was about 5 feet away now and began jabbing at Nova with his long spear. Nova jumped back and forth in between the attacks until one came straight toward his head. Nova's hands came together in front of him catching the spear about one-inch from his face. Nova used it for leverage and spun around while holding the spear and roundhouse kicked Blaze in the head. Blaze caught Nova by the ears and brought Nova up to be looking him straight in the eyes. Nova punched Blaze across the face knocking him to the ground. Nova ran forward and pulled his arm back as hard as he could and came forward hitting Blaze and creating a big bang sound. Blaze stumbled back, grabbed his stomach, and his two front legs fell to their knees. Blaze looked up at Nova and raised his spear above his head. He began spinning it around and then brought it down below his arm and it ended pointing at Nova. A large blast of energy came rushing forward toward Nova. Nova tried to jump over it, but was to late and it burned his feet. Nova fell to the ground and struggled to his feet. His legs were in a severe amount of pain. He looked Blaze deep in the eyes and then ran forward and gave the strongest kick he could ever give, his foot went through Blaze and Blaze fell into two pieces. Nova turned his back toward the dead blaze and a little bit of green gas escaped from just below his little flap of a tail.
A zilla picked up Destroyer from behind and began squeezing. "Know that you were killed by one of the best." It said in a deep voice.
"Know that you weren't one of the best." With that she slipped out of his hands by turning to pure liquid, then reformed, turned to look at the zilla and then shot a large beam at him. He was hit then surrounded by an outline of a coffin in ice, the coffin imploded on him then exploded in icy blue energy.
The zilla stumbled forward and started, "But I'm rank # 2, I can't...." With that he was hit with two of the blasts that he was previously hit with and collapsed on the ground. He then struggled back to his feet squinting his eyes in pain, Destroyer floated forward, her arm turned into and ice sword and she slashed the zilla across the place where there would be a neck if he had one. He collapsed on the ground not moving this time.
The battle continued for hours, until all the monsters were dead or knocked out. The humans were all also out cold. Two monsters remained, Death and Entity. Death chuckled, "You again, I'm at full power this time, you can't win."
"Wrong." Entity raised both his arms up and shot two large blasts out of his arms, Death put both hands out to stop them, but they were to strong and his arms collapsed under the power and he was hit.
He got back up to his feet and growled. "How about we see what you've got, bring it." He gestured with his hand toward himself.
Entity ran forward toward Death and punched. Death caught the attack and came with a large slap from the side. Entity ducked under it and jumped into the air, a sword of white energy formed in his hands and he began flipping and came down on top of Death, hitting him with the sword over and over. Death stumbled back in pain. Then shot an energy blast at Entity. Entity tried to catch it but it exploded on contact and sent him flying back. He shot small blasts from his right arm at Death. Death backhanded one blast away, then another, then was hit in the chest with a big one, knocking him to the ground. He formed some energy above his head and threw a large fireball at Entity. Entity had a sword come from each wrist which he crossed in front of him, he blocked the fireball with them and held it for a second before uncrossing them and sending the fireball back at Death, Death caught it with his hands and raised it above his head and sent it flying back. Entity shot multiple beams from his eye into the fireball, it exploded sending them both flying. Entity spread his wings out and with the jet flew high into the air and began charging a cannon on one arm. Death stood up and two dark pink wings sprouted from his back, which he began to flap and they lifted him off he ground. He flew toward Entity full speed. Entity fired his cannon and it was a huge laser blast that tore into Death and knocked him to the ground. Entity flew toward the falling Death and began punching him again and again and then finished with a kick to Death's head that sent him flying into the ground. He flew toward Death laser swords at his sides to finish Death off, Death laid on the ground not moving.
Right before his swords pierced Death's skin, Death caught him with his large arms and began to squeeze Entity. "Finally, I have one. Let me show you my true power." Death had Entity's arms pinned to his sides and he could not lift his legs up far to hit Death's arms, and they were not long enough to kick him. Death began to glow and smiled with his sharp white shiny teeth. Then a spear came through his chest. It was pulled out a second afterward. Death fell to the ground, dead. Behind him stood Crusader, battered and bruised, but still strong enough to finish business.
March 30th, 1064

"This tournament we have the top ten monsters competing for new ranks. It is expected that Destroyer take the #1 position this time. There will also be some changing down below. There will also be an unveiling of the new monster that the trainers Elyk and Atries will be training. It is rumored to be some type of henger. Now the tournament will begin!" The announcer yelled and the crowd cheered.
"Battle #1, Nova versus One Eye." Nova walked out to the center of the arena. One Eye hopped out there on his tail. "Let the battle begin!!" Nova got in a fighting stance and One Eye gritted his teeth.
Nova ran full speed at One Eye and punched as hard as he could, One Eye disappeared and reappeared behind Nova and then started slapping Nova with his tongue. Nova ducked to the ground then rolled over and jumped to his feet. One Eye disappeared and reappeared above Nova and came down on top of him with his tail, Nova caught the tail, turned, and slammed One Eye into the ground. Then he kicked One Eye into an arena wall. One Eye got up and shot a laser from his eye at Nova, Nova punched it to the side sending it into another wall. Nova walked forward slowly staring One Eye down. One Eye growled and a small vein in his forehead began to stick out. Then in a second One Eye grew to the size of a house and bent down to try to bite Nova, Nova dodged to the side, but One Eye did not shrink down he went for another bite, and he hit. Nova was squished between the teeth and One Eye began to chew, Nova becoming greatly injured. Nova caught himself and put his feet on One Eye's bottom teeth and his hands on One Eye upper teeth, One Eye struggled but could not close his mouth. With that Nova let a large amount of gas flow from below his fluffy tell, One Eye spit Nova out, shrunk back down to normal size and collapsed.
"The winner of this battle is Nova!" The announcer yelled and everyone cheered.
Throughout the rest of the battles it continued with Nova wins! and Destroyer wins, until the last battle, where the two finally met to battle for the world championship. "This battle will be between the two strongest monsters on the planet. Nova and Destroyer!" They both went into the arena and got into a fighting stance. "Let the battle begin!" With that the two went toward each other full speed. Nova jumped out of the way of Destroyer and came up from behind her. He began rapidly hitting her in the back. She turned and was hit by a strong attack right to the head. Nova didn't let down and began punching her in the stomach, then gave her an uppercut and kicked her in the stomach. Her hand turned into and ice sword and came down on top of Nova, Nova caught it and broke it off. She screamed in horror and jumped back out of pain's way. Nova ran toward her and jumped into the air and kicked her in the head, landed and continued to kick her in the face, back and forth across it. She floated into the air and shot down an ice beam at Nova, Nova was hit and it shaped around in him in the form of a coffin, he let a big one escape from underneath his fluffy tail and all the ice melted. Destroyer was worried and began charging in both hands, blue energy rose from her. Nova began glowing and one hand began to electrify and sparks flew about it. She shot her blasts at him and he jumped toward her. He broke through both blasts with the electrified fist and then hit her in the stomach. She fell to the ground and didn't move. "The winner is..... Nova!!" Nova jumped up and down and held his boxing glove shaped hands above his head.
"Now what we've all been waiting for. The unveiling of the new monster to be trained by two of the greatest trainers of all time. Meet..... Entity!" A sheet was taken off of the golden henger's head. "His strength level at about 2 months old is rumored to be stronger than any monster ever! I will bring up his stats on the teletron right now, they are as follows," A screen on came out of the ground from the middle of the arena and on it some numbers came up. "Oh my god, he's incredibly strong, life is 999, power is 1000, intelligence is 1000, skill is 1200, speed is 1051 and defense is 1207. The strongest monster ever recorded, Hardcore, didn't even have his stats at straight max, and now it's been found that it wasn't even the max. That was the thought to be the highest physically possible for any monster to get. But that theory has now been disapproved. Thank you everyone and goodnight!"
